attributes.action: fulfill his promise to halve poverty by 2015 - we should be half way there by now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It’s half time to halve poverty
In the year 2000, you and other
world leaders made a promise -
to halve poverty by 2015 through
the Millennium Development
Goals. This summer it’s half time to
halve poverty, and many of the goals
are in danger of not being met.
As part of Micah Challenge -
a global movement of Christians
committed to standing for justice
– I urge you to play your part in
ensuring the promise is kept.
